form.instruction:
You need to make sure the adverbs in your lexicon will be mapped to the syntactic category Adv. Choose one of the following options, depending on your situation:
If you already have adverbs marked with the category Adv in your lexicon, nothing more needs to be done.
If adverbs are mixed in with another category in the lexicon, you either need to give them the category Adv in your morphological parser, or add the feature makeAdv to each appropriate entry in the lexicon so the category will be changed for the syntax.
If you have adverbs marked in your lexicon with a distinct category all their own, but it is different from Adv, enter that category below so PAWS can map your morphological category to Adv.
Adv
Run the file advtest.txt through your morphological parser and then run the syntactic parser on the output. Check the log browser for the results and note any changes you need to make to the lexicon or to answers about the order of elements in the phrase structure rules. Make the changes as needed and rerun.
Please check off this section now in 'Contents' and then proceed to the Adjectives and AdjP section when you are ready.
